title: Tell me about a road trip you took.

korean: 지난 여름에 친구들이랑 강원도로 드라이브 여행 갔었어요.
일찍 가니까 도로도 막히지 않고 되게 상쾌했어요.
창문 열고 음악 틀어놓고 달리는데 진짜 기분 좋더라고요.
중간에 휴게소 들러서 호두과자랑 커피도 사 먹고.
양양 도착해서는 서핑도 하고 해변에서 놀았어요.
점심은 회 먹고, 저녁에는 바비큐 파티 했고요.
밤에 별 보면서 캠핑하는 게 제일 기억에 남아요.
돌아오는 길에는 다들 피곤해서 차에서 잤는데.
제가 운전해야 해서 혼자 깨어 있었죠.
힘들었지만 또 가고 싶을 정도로 재밌었어요.
english: Last summer, I went on a road trip to Gangwon-do with my friends.
We left at 5 in the morning and headed to Yangyang.
Because we left early, the roads weren't congested and it felt really refreshing.
Driving with the windows down and music playing, it felt so good, you know.
We stopped at a rest area in the middle and bought walnut cakes and coffee.
Korean rest area food is surprisingly tasty, right?
When we got to Yangyang, we went surfing and played at the beach.
For lunch we had raw fish, and in the evening we had a barbecue party.
What I remember most is camping and watching the stars at night.
On the way back, everyone was tired so they slept in the car.
But I had to drive, so I was the only one awake.
It was tiring, but it was so fun that I want to go again.
